answerText: Lake Volta[10] Lake Volta is located within this African nation, whose capital is Accra. The last three presidents of this nation have had the first name John.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 9 | 4 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This body of water was created in the 1960s by the creation of the Akosombo Dam on its namesake river.  [10] Name this largest reservoir in the world, which has been the site of hundreds of boating accidents due to collisions with tall underwater trees.
